    Sina Heidari, M.Sc.

    University of Zanjan

    • Iran
    • GitHub
    • Email

    I'm a graduate student at the University of Zanjan, collaborating with Dr. Sadoon Azizi at the University of Kurdistan. My research interests span Distributed Systems, Cloud/Edge Computing, Internet of Things, and High-performance Computing. My primary focus lies in autonomous resource management within serverless computing environments, where I've gained hands-on expertise with cloud-native tools like Kubernetes and Prometheus.

    Recent News

    Our paper recieved Best Paper Award at The 7th International Conference on Internet of Things and Its Applications.

    Our paper titled "Heterogeneity-aware Load Balancing in Serverless Computing Environments" authored by Sina Heidari and Sadoon Azizi has been accepted for presentation at The 7th International Conference on Internet of Things and Its Applications.
